content: Relax poolside in a variety of positions with the adjustable water hammock / lounger. This versatile pool accessory’s unique design can be adjusted on the fly so you can switch back and forth from a seating to a laying position.

Build an empire of sweets your kids will go crazy for using this castle cake mold. With this unique non-stick bundt pan, you’ll be able to enjoy professional bakery quality cakes with minimal effort and for a fraction of the price.

Make vegetables fun to eat for the kids by serving some delicious cobs using these sword corn skewers. These plastic handles will keep your hands clean and make your yummy corn appear like a long and oddly shaped ninja or pirate sword.

Ensure your productivity takes a plunge by decorating your office with this Where’s Waldo mural. This novelty mural transforms an entire wall into a giant page from the iconic children’s activity book – allowing you to see everything in stunning detail.

Get incredible shots of the world around you by taking pictures using this extendable GoPro pole. This sturdy pole extends up to an incredible 40 inches, comes with a handy strap for mounting the remote, and can retract to a compact package for easy transportation.

Get your family eating healthier by making the kids delicious treats using this frozen fruit dessert maker. It allows you to turn frozen fruit into incredibly tasty and nutritious desserts that’ll be more merciful on the waistline than those store bought brands.

Keep your kitty entertained by installing this multi level cat climber in your humble abode. The space saving design can easily be installed over any existing door to provide your feline with a cozy spot for exercising, sleeping, or plotting his next diabolical move.

Throw out those obsolete bulky baskets and get serious about your outdoor dining with this picnic backpack. It includes everything you need for a superb alfresco dining experience, such as a removable leak resistant liner and a detachable wine holder.

Dress elegantly without worrying about where you’re going to stash your things using this ingenious garter pocket. Lined with a classy lace exterior, the inside of the band features several pockets you can use to stash everything from your phone, to makeup, to cash.

titleEN: Lisa Frank Collector’s Set Sticker Book
content: Relive your glorious elementary school days by going through the pages of this Lisa Frank Collector’s set sticker book. The most recognized brand in overly vibrant children’s school supplies is back with 12 pages of rainbow colored dolphins, unicorns, and kittens.

Harness the power of the sun to cook meals in as little as 20 minutes by preparing them on this solar powered grill. The futuristic looking design takes advantage of every drop of sunshine to bake, boil, and fry whatever food you’re craving.

titleEN: Yoga Pose Green Army Men Toys
content: Show your children that not everything in life needs to be resolved with violence using these yoga pose green army men toys. They’ve hung up their rifles and have traded in prone and kneeling positions in favor of downward-facing dog and warrior pose.

Set your sand sculptures apart from the rest on the beach by giving them a unique touch using this sand funnel toy. Ideal for the beach or the sandbox, this nifty tool lets you mix water and sand and drip it over your base sculptures for a cool textured look.

Make lunchtime more exciting for the young ones by bringing their meals to life using this rice ball kitten mold. Complete with a mold, cutting mat, and seaweed cutter, you’ll have everything you need to create cute little edible feline rice balls.

Kickstart your morning with an extra jolt of energy by pairing your coffee with one of these scrumptious caffeinated cookies. These all natural treats provide a long lasting energy boost designed to keep you going and feeling full.

Keep your loyal travel companion from freezing his family jewels off by having him stay inside the dog sleeping bag. This compact bag features a sturdy nylon liner that’s breathable and fast drying – making it great for adverse weather conditions.

Ensure that only the intended pet gets to eat his food using this clever microchip pet feeder. It helps keep food fresh and ensures that only the designated pet can access the food within – making it a must-have for animals on specialized diets.

Keep your high tech gadgets juiced up while on the go by harnessing the sun’s power with this solar charger hydration backpack. Apart from providing a 1.8 liter bladder with an anti-spill valve, it comes with a 5V USB port for easy hook up.

Turn the mundane task of tying your shoes into a thing of the past by switching to the shoelace fastening system. It features a unique locking mechanism that’s remarkably secure and easy to lace up – making it ideal for any kind of physical activity.

Get an eagle’s eye view of your surroundings as you whiz by on this 260 foot zip line kit. It comes with everything you need to fly across the land – from a galvanized aircraft grade cable to a stopping block for smooth braking.

Keep your precious beer unsoiled until the moment it touches your lips by protecting it with these beer pong cup ball catchers. Designed to fit 16 and 18 ounce disposable cups, they slide over the mouth and prevent that dirty ball from ever falling into the beer.

Keep unsightly water rings from appearing on your contemporary furniture by placing your beverages on top of these mini pallet drink coasters. Made from high quality compressed fiberboard, these eco-friendly coasters make a perfect gift idea for any home.

Give a whole new meaning to the term flat bed by outfitting your pickup with this truck bed air mattress. It features a built in rechargeable pump for easy inflation/deflation and is made from a super heavy duty cloth that makes it ideal for outdoor use.

Revive your dead car even if no one else is around to lend a helping hand by using this portable car jump starter. It also comes with a built in flashlight and two USB ports so you can keep all your mobile devices going in case of emergency.

Relive your greatest journeys whenever you wish by keeping detailed accounts of them in this adventure log. The log is compact enough to fit comfortably in your pocket and comes with 48 blank pages ready to be filled up by your epic travel exploits.

Turn your backyard into an all inclusive five star getaway by outfitting your watering hole with these swimming pool bar stools. The built-in weight system means you can simply drop them in the water and you’re good to go.

Get an authentic smoky charcoal like flavor from your gas grill by cooking atop the barbecue grill smoking platform. Wood chips smolder directly under your meat, giving it a more concentrated smoky flavor while still maintaining a humid grilling environment.

Smart watches are old news. Vintage calculator watches are all the rage now with the youngsters. This resilient watch boasts a 5 year battery life and features a 1/100 second stop watch, alarm clock, and a handy 8 digit calculator.

Become a master escape artist by working on your technique with the transparent escape practice handcuffs. The handcuffs’s clear casing allows you to see all the inner workings in great detail so you can study them at length.

Locate your car in record time by outfitting it with the Bluetooth parked car finder. Apart from helping you find your vehicle in a large parking lot, this handy device also reminds you if you’re leaving your phone behind, in addition to working as a charger.

Bring the noise this summer by showing up to the beach with the boombox cooler. This high tech cooler will keep all your drinks nice and cold while the 600 watt premium sound system installed in the lid bumps out your favorite tunes.

Maximize every square inch of your beloved Jeep by storing your gear on this spare tire organizer. Once placed securely over the tire, it provides you with ample storage space – including a large center compartment and four smaller ones along the sides.

Help justice prevail by arming yourself with the tactical self defense pen. This fully functional refillable pen features a sturdy aircraft aluminum frame and comes with a DNA catcher – to help police accurately identify your attacker – alongside a built in handcuff key.

Spend less time slaving over a hot stove by sticking an uncooked meal in the oven safe slow cooker. The cooker slowly prepares your food while preserving all the moisture, nutrients, and flavors for a truly exceptional home cooked meal.

Turn mealtime into playtime by enjoying a lovely alfresco meal on the Twister picnic blanket. This comfortable fleece blanket’s fun novelty design works great for sitting on or playing over and comes with a waterproof backing that makes it ideal for outdoor use.

Kick those healthy habits to the curb and hop aboard the cholesterol train by making some delicious treats using the jerky gun and seasoning kit. It comes with all the ingredients you’ll need to whip up tasty jerky sticks the whole family will enjoy snacking on.

Keep your keys from obnoxiously jingling around all day while you move about by utilizing the MagKey smart key holder. This clever everyday carry pulls your keys together into a neat row so they’re organized and jingle-free.

Indulge Mr. Whiskers’s musical side while you help keep his paws trimmed with this cat keyboard scratcher. Apart from providing you with new material for your illustrious YouTube channel, it’ll also help ensure your lovely furniture doesn’t get shredded up.

Keep your phone handy at all times while you’re busy driving by placing it on the magnetic air vent mount. Made with rare earth magnets, they provide a strong grip while maintaining your phone or GPS at the perfect angle.

Make a sunny day out on the water a little brighter by having your drink bob around on one of these floating flamingo drink holsters. They inflate in an instant and provide a snug place for your beer can to stay upright while you frolic about in the water.

Give your literary collection a little whimsical appeal by placing it on this superhero floating book shelf. The clever design creates the illusion your books are floating as the mighty hero flies underneath them to keep them from falling.

Find comfort in an old childhood friend by laying down on this giant Hello Kitty pillow bed. This XXL Hello Kitty is made from soft delicate fabrics that provide maximum comfort and comes with a removable and washable liner so you can easily clean it.

Brighten up a bleak rainy day instantly by keeping yourself dry under this color wheel umbrella. The umbrella features an elegant wooden hook handle along with a vibrant rainbow motif that’ll turn heads wherever you go.

Keep your valued personal belongings safe from prying eyes by concealing them inside of this leather book iPhone case. It features a removable protective iPhone shell in addition to providing slots for cash, credit cards and other important documents.

Keep a picture perfect lawn year round without ever breaking a sweat by placing the robotic lawn mower on the job. It comes ready to use out of the box and can be programmed with a specific schedule so your lawn will always look perfectly manicured.

Witness the majesty of our universe with incredible clarity by looking into the night sky with this computerized telescope. It features a CGE pro computerized mount combined with a killer optical system to provide an observatory-like experience.

Save yourself a small fortune next time your phone gets a boo-boo by taking matters into your own hands using this cracked iPhone screen repair kit. It includes everything you’ll need to revive your phone from the dead and get the screen looking brand new.

Get the party started when you show up with the light show speaker system. This fifty watt Bluetooth speaker provides great sound and comes fitted with a disco ball-like light that projects pulsating multicolor patterns onto the walls.

Turn your kitchen counter into a gourmet dessert station by whipping up tasty concoctions on the ice cream parlor mixing set. It includes all the tools you need to serve your favorite frozen treat just like the professionals – Coldstone just became obsolete.

Stay on top of your weight loss by tracking your progress on the WiFi smart scale. This high tech scale accurately tracks your weight, body fat, and BMI so you can upload them to your computer and create graphs that allow you to easily track your evolution.

Show off your artistic side by protecting your expensive phone using this vibrant watercolor set iPhone case. Styled to look like a used watercolor set, this ultra slim case’s creative design adds color to your look while snapping on in an instant.

Be ready to handle anything that comes your way by stepping up to the grill wearing the tactical camouflage BBQ apron. It provides ample storage for all your tools and condiments in addition to offering specialized holsters for up to six frosty brews.

Put your engineering skills to the test by taking on this modular robotics kit. With a little bit of time and elbow grease you’ll be able to unleash your imagination while mixing and matching parts to build a variety of small walking robots.

Keep the party raging while you cool off in the water with this floating beer pong raft. A must have for any summertime outing, it comes with a slew of cup holders, a convenient little cooler at the center, and doubles as a mattress in case you party too hard.

Transform any dumbbell on the rack into a handy kettle bell with this custom clamp. Cast from aluminum and stainless steel, this clamp is designed to fit any style dumbbell and features a 90 degree  pivoting handle to ensure an ideal grip while you work out.

Turn your home into a den of ecstasy, music, and mind blowing visual effects using this black light glow party kit. The kit contains top grade black lights designed to install much easier than traditional bulbs while producing a brighter glow.

Ensure you never have to replace damaged cables by switching over to these fray resistant nylon cables. Each cable is coated with a tough nylon exterior that protects it from daily wear and tear – so you get more bang for your buck.

Keep your guest’s stomachs happy by serving up a variety of snacks on the two tiered slate serving stand. The elegant design provides ample room for your spread and features a chalkboard-like writeable surface.

Spark up like a fashionable lady by lighting up your cigarette using this lipstick lighter. The compact size makes it convenient to carry anywhere while the novelty design makes it a sensible fashion choice for matching with any outfit.

Take your DJing skills to the next level by unleashing your creativity on the four channel digital mixer. This ground-breaking mixer comes equipped with a Xone dual filter system and is powered by a quad FX core DSP engine.

titleEN: Oh The Places You’ll Eff Up Parody Book
content: Take a whimsical ride through the many mistakes you’re bound to make in life by perusing through the pages of the “Oh The Places You’ll Eff Up” parody book. It’s filled with page after page of clever rhymes depicting life’s many less than graceful moments.

Get the nutrients your body needs and the flavor your tastebuds crave by biting into a scrumptious cricket flour protein bar. Whipped up by a three star Michelin chef, these healthy treats are made without dairy, gluten, or refined sugars – just good ol’ crickets.

Bring your favorite pill like characters from the big screen to your humble abode by wearing these minion slippers. These comfy slippers are made from ultra soft plush materials and are styled to make your feet look like two cuddly minions.

Get an enhanced view of the world around you by turning your smartphone into a thermal imaging device. This lightweight accessory displays live thermal infrared imagery through your phone so you can see things from a thermal perspective.

Give your drab walls a facelift by showing off your love for urban culture by plastering this graffiti wallpaper all over the crib. Each piece comes brilliantly designed with dozens of differently styled and colored tags that create an eye catching visual.

Introduce a charming theater vibe to any room in your home using this Broadway styled light cord. This handy fifteen foot light cord comes outfitted with six standard light sockets with two feet spacing in between – making it ideal for either indoor or outdoor use.

Make a splash this summer when you hit the water with this rubber ducky float. Once inflated your ducky will stand at nearly forty inches tall while featuring two conveniently placed handles on its neck to provide a steady place to hold on to.

Enjoy an array of comfortable seating positions when you’re relaxing on the fully adjustable pool recliner float. The steel frame comes wrapped in double thick layers of vinyl coated foam and can be adjusted just like a lawn chair so you’re always comfortable.

Put your artistic skills to the test by taking on the monumental task of completing the expert level coloring book. Each page comes illustrated with incredibly beautiful and intricate patterns designed to challenge you like never before.

Transform your fancy smartphone into the greatest portable gaming device ever conceived by protecting it with this bamboo Game Boy iPhone case. Made completely from bamboo, it gives your phone geeky appeal while providing excellent protection.

Create a more pleasant sleeping environment for the little ones using this birdcage LED night light. The cute little bird sits calmly and quietly in his glass cage to provide a soothing and warm glow for your bundle of joy to slumber next to.

Ditch the cheap plastic and give your creations a more sophisticated appearance using these wooden LEGO style bricks. Instead of using juvenile colored building blocks, these bricks will give your masterpiece a refined earthy tone.

Become a prime target for every thief and mugger in a five mile radius when you hit the town wearing the black dial stainless steel Rolex. This first rate timepiece features unrivaled craftsmanship and an ageless design that will complement any look.

Bake up some groovy looking shrooms that any gamer would love to sink their teeth into with this Super Mario mushroom cupcake pan. The pan allows you to create two differently sized half domes that you can stack up to create yummy 1-up mushrooms.

Get a little relief from the summer heat at your next outdoor function by bringing along the portable misting fan. The fan can be set up almost anywhere and features a built-in four liter water tank capable of delivering a powerful yet cool mist all day long.

Light up the night by accenting your outfit with these flashing LED earrings. They’re available in many vibrant colors such as blue, red, pink, white, and come with replaceable batteries so you can keep the party going night after night.

Instantly turn your smartphone into the professional quality camera you’ve always wanted using this specialized camera lens. The lens easily attaches to your phone and features up to 1/16,000 second shutter speed at 10 frames per second.

Dive head first into the world of extreme sports by riding on this mini electric dirt bike. The bike features authentic Jeremy McGrath graphics and Fairing design and can reach speeds of 15 MPH making it ideal for young daredevils in training.

titleEN: Stand Up Paddleboard Pet Traction Mat
content: Help your four legged friend catch the ride of a lifetime by equipping your board with this stand up paddleboard pet traction mat. The specialized mat fits any type of board and provides your pet with a stable and non slippery surface to stand on while riding.

Relive the nostalgia of wrist slap bracelets by keeping your shades on you at all times with these slap band sunglasses. The clever design features a hinge-nose frame that allows you to slap them around different parts of your body.

Perform your job in the harshest environments by upgrading to the indestructible laptop. The display is optimized to guarantee excellent clarity in bright ambient lighting and is designed to stand up to extreme levels of dust, heat, cold, and vibration.

Customize your yard’s look with the swipe of a finger using these garden solar LED lights. The lights feature an elegant and compact design that can be set up virtually anywhere so that you can light up your yard with any color imaginable.

Manage your time more efficiently by visualizing your hectic workday on the face of the whiteboard wall clock. This fully functional clock features a whiteboard backdrop that you can write your daily schedule onto using a magic marker.

Double down every round when you fill up using the double beer mug. The ingenious auto-leveling design bonds two plentiful fifteen ounce mugs to one sturdy handle so you can drink twice as much from a single serving.

GoPro just announced its new Hero4 Session camera – and it’s the smallest model they’ve ever developed. It’s only 1.5 inches long on each side, can shoot 1080p at 60 frames per second, and is waterproof up to 10 meters without needing a case!

Track your progress while you burn calories with help from this fitness and activity monitoring watch. The ergonomic design provides a comfortable fit while providing you with helpful exercise data to guide you towards a more active and healthy lifestyle.

Give the geek in your life a birthday present they’ll never forget by decorating their cake using these comic book cake toppers. These lively toppers features colorful designs inspired by the classic comic book action phrases like “ZAP!”, “WHAM!”, and “BOOM!”.

Turn anywhere you sit into the ideal spot for a gaming session with this ultimate gamer’s lap desk. The portable design fits comfortably over the lap and provides you with enough space so you can easily use your laptop’s keyboard, mouse, and tablet.

Make your love of gaming known to everyone at the watering hole by showing up with this geektastic Nintendo controller float. This giant five foot long controller perfectly depicts the classic gaming console controller and inflates in just minutes.

Create a small oasis in the middle of your pool by setting up this floating umbrella. Offering you shelter from the sun while you’re still in the pool, the umbrella conveniently floats around while providing you with a small table ideal for setting down drinks.

Stop losing stuff in your giant blackhole of bed sheets by placing your things on this folding bedside shelf. No assembly required – it comes with convenient cord holders along the sides and provides enough space for phones, wallets, and tablets.

Keep a vigilant eye over your finances by tracking your savings using this digital coin counting money jar. This high tech piggy bank comes with a specialized lid that keeps track of every coin that goes in, so you know just how much is in the bank.

Avoid drinking your buddy’s reality escaping grape juice by labeling your wine glasses using these metallic pens. The pens use nontoxic ink and are designed to easily wash off with a sponge, soap and some water when you’re done drinking away your troubles.

Give your PC setup a cool comic book feel by using this Iron Man mouse. Designed to look like Iron Man’s iconic mask, the eyes light up when the mouse is in use and it features a convenient standby mode to save power when not in use.

Drench the enemy by unleashing a fierce hail storm of water bombs with help from this mass water balloon loader. It allows you to easily fill up a handful of balloons in seconds so you spend less time refilling and more time attacking.

Give your patio some eye catching appeal with this hanging chair nest. The bold design suspends a giant cocoon like structure above the ground so you can comfortably cuddle up while enjoying some nice fresh air.

Keep your guests happy by quickly refilling their drinks once they’ve eagerly chugged them down by keeping this rolling bar cart handy at all times. Rather than having to constantly get up for a refill, you simply roll all your libations to wherever you are.

Transform your fragile phone into an all weather warrior by protecting it with this waterproof battery iPhone case. Apart from providing protection against the elements, the case doubles as an external battery, giving you up to 14 additional hours of use!

Help your gorgeous stemware last a lifetime with these handy wine stem savers. Once safely clasped onto the wine glass stem, you simply place the glass over the top or bottom rack of the dishwasher and it will remain perfectly still as it’s being washed.

Keep Gotham’s Dark Knight at your beck and call by summoning him anytime you want using this bat signal projector pen. At the press of a button, the Caped Crusader’s iconic bat shaped logo projects onto whatever surface you point it towards.
